title: Hello World & Print Statements
description: Learn your first Python program and how to output text to the console.

title: Variables & Data Types
description: Understanding variables, strings, integers, floats, and booleans.

title: While Loops
description: Learn to repeat code with while loops and control loop execution.

title: Dictionaries
description: Master key-value pairs and dictionary operations in Python.

title: File Handling
description: Read from and write to files, manage file operations safely.

title: Lists
description: Work with ordered collections and master list operations.

title: Functions
description: Create reusable code blocks with parameters and return values.

title: Regular Expressions
description: Master pattern matching and text manipulation with regex.

title: Error Handling
description: Handle exceptions gracefully and build robust applications.

title: Input Validation
description: Validate and sanitize user input for secure applications.

title: String Methods & Special Characters
description: Master string manipulation methods and special character handling.

title: Variable Types & Type Conversion
description: Understand Python types and convert between different data types.
